items.title: Campbell’s says soup sales are soaring—and that’s actually a sign the U.S. economy is in a downturn, data shows
items.description: More people are cooking at home since early 2020.

items.title: This plant compound could lower your risk of heart disease and diabetes, according to new research
items.description: A new study is among the first to show the benefits of phytosterols as part of a regular diet.

items.title: Germany unveils €45.8 billion in corporate tax breaks to supercharge stagnant economy
items.description: Under the plans, Germany's corporate tax rate would fall by one percent a year from 2028 to reach 10 percent, down from 15 percent.

items.title: Exclusive: Vivrelle raises $62 million to expand its service renting handbags from Prada and Chanel as part of a luxury ‘lifestyle’
items.description: The startup is part of the next generation of rental services.

items.title: Rails launches perps-only crypto exchange in the U.S. with $14 million in new funding to build a better FTX
items.description: Rails is backed by Sam Lessin’s Slow Ventures and cofounded by the former Grindr COO.
